comment:
* Callback interface for use with {@link Application#registerOnProvideAssistDataListener}
     * and {@link Application#unregisterOnProvideAssistDataListener}.

methods.name: public void onProvideAssistData(Activity activity, Bundle data)
methods.comment:
* This is called when the user is requesting an assist, to build a full
         * {@link Intent#ACTION_ASSIST} Intent with all of the context of the current
         * application.  You can override this method to place into the bundle anything
         * you would like to appear in the {@link Intent#EXTRA_ASSIST_CONTEXT} part
         * of the assist Intent.

methodNames: public void onProvideAssistData(Activity activity, Bundle data)
